name: Shift Capital
description:
At SHIFT, we are on a mission to create inclusive, equitable communities who thrive. Through our Whole Neighborhood approach, we invest in places AND people to create opportunity and shared prosperity for all. We deploy integrated development strategies that connect the economic and social dots across sectors, partners, and neighborhoods. To better serve people. And, to help create better lives

http://shiftcapital.us/

This organization is part of the Philadelphia Justice and Equity Fellowship:
